title: Healthy smoked salmon salad
ingredients: ['200g salad greens (e.g. spinach or arugula), leaves torn', '150g smoked salmon, cut into strips', '1 tomato, cut into cubes', '1 red pepper, cut into strips', '2 tablespoons capers', '1 bunch spring onions, minced', '1 tablespoon prepared mustard', '2 tablespoons wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
